availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hamilton Ellis (Henry County, Kentucky, deputy court clerk)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, deputy court clerk and attorney. Kentucky Native. Student in the Taylor Academy at Kentucky University in Harrodsburg, Kentucky, in 1859. Law student in New Castle, Kentucky, in 1860. Deputy clerk of Henry County Court in Henry County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 245.
First Annual Announcement of Kentucky University, 1859, (Louisville, KY: Morton & Griswold, Printers, 1859), 31-32 (Accessed via American Antiquarian Society at ancestry.com).
